Name: Date
Description: Date of record

Name: Id
Description: Category numerical identifyier

Name: Name
Description: Category name

Name: Alias
Description: Category alias (one-word only)

Name: Color
Description: CSS color name available in [matplotlib](https://matplotlib.org/stable/gallery/color/named_colors.html) (ex: `blue`) or hexadecimal code of color (ex: `#5234eb`).

Name: D
Description: Critical Hamming Distance of trait orientation for agent-place interaction

Name: R
Description: Critical radius distance for agent movement.

Name: M
Description: Agent memory lag time.

Name: C
Description: Agent or Place openness to contamination, degree of interaction influence

Name: x
Description: Position coordinate in the x axis

Name: y
Description: Position coordinate in the y axis

Name: Trait
Description: Trait orientation value

Name: Metadata
Description: Name of metadata

Name: Value
Description: Value of data

Name: Agents File
Description: File path to the agents parameter file (ex: C:/data/param_agents.txt)

Name: Places File
Description: File path to the places parameter file (ex: C:/data/param_places.txt)

Name: Input Folder
Description: Folder path to the input data folder (ex: C:/data)

Name: Run Folder
Description: Folder path to the folder to store simulation outputs (ex: C:/output)

Name: Steps
Description: Number of time steps in the simulation

Name: Stat
Description: Keyword for `statistic`

Name: Sum
Description: Keyword for `sum`

Name: Mean
Description: Keyword for `Mean`

Name: Med
Description: Keyword for `Median`

Name: Min
Description: Keyword for `Minimum`

Name: Max
Description: Keyword for `Maximum`

Name: p05
Description: Keyword for `5% percentile`

Name: p95
Description: Keyword for `95% percentile`

Name: SD
Description: Keyword for `Standard Deviation`

Name: Count
Description: Keyword for `Counting`

Name: A_Id_x
Description: Position coordinate in the x axis of Agent A_Id (ex: A_12_x)

Name: A_Id_y
Description: Position coordinate in the y axis of Agent A_Id (ex: A_12_y)

Name: P_Id_x
Description: Position coordinate in the x axis of Place P_Id (ex: P_10_x)

Name: A_Id_Trait
Description: Trait orientation of Agent A_Id (ex: A_12_Trait)

Name: P_Id_Trait
Description: Trait orientation of Place P_Id (ex: P_10_Trait)

Name: Step
Description: Time step number

Name: Count
Description: Counting units

Name: H
Description: Shannon Entropy

Name: H_agents
Description: Shannon Entropy of Agents

Name: H_places
Description: Shannon Entropy of Places

Name: Id_node
Description: Category numerical identifyier of Nodes

Name: Id_node_src
Description: Category numerical identifyier of Source Node in Network

Name: Id_node_dst
Description: Category numerical identifyier of Destiny Node in Network

Name: Id_place
Description: Category numerical identifyier of Place in Network

Name: Id_place_src
Description: Category numerical identifyier of Source Place in Network

Name: Id_place_dst
Description: Category numerical identifyier of Destiny Place in Network

Name: Path_x
Description: Array of integers of x coordinates concatenated by hyphen

Name: Path_y
Description: Array of integers of y coordinates concatenated by hyphen

Name: Geom
Description: Feature geometry encoded in Well Known Text

Name: Euclidean
Description: Euclidean distance

Name: AStar
Description: Non-euclidean distance computed by the A-Star algorithm

Name: Parameter
Description: Name of variable set as a parameter in the sensitivity analysis

Name: Grid
Description: Number of segments for sampling the parameter space

Name: Weighting
Description: Keyword for weighting function. Options: `uniform`, `linear`, `exponential` and `gravity`
